info.title: MomJourney API
info.description: API for managing tasks, diaries, users, and authentication for the MomJourney app.

tags.name: Auth
tags.description: Operations for user registration, login, and authentication management.

tags.name: Weeks
tags.description: Operations related to weekly plans or summaries.

get.description: Retrieve a list of all emotions available in the system.
Returns information about the currently authenticated user.

put.description: Updates the authenticated user's avatar by uploading a new image to Cloudinary.

avatar.description: The image file to upload as the user's avatar.

patch.description: Updates user's profile data (name, email, babyGender, dueDate).

post.description: Refreshes an existing session using a refresh token. Returns a new access token.

parameters.name: refreshToken
parameters.description: Refresh token to renew the session

post.description: Logs out a user by deleting the current session.

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Field to sort the diaries by

post.description: Create a new diary entry. Private endpoint.

category.description: Array of emotion IDs (ObjectIds from the emotions collection). Can select multiple emotions.

description.example: Today I felt the first baby kick.

patch.description: Update an existing diary entry by its ID. Only the user who created the diary (userId) can update it.

category.description: Array of emotion IDs (ObjectIds from the emotions collection). Can select multiple emotions.

description.example: Today I felt very productive and motivated.

delete.description: Deletes a diary by its ID. Only the owner can delete their dairy.

204.description: Diary successfully deleted. No content returned.

get.description: Private endpoint to get all tasks.   Returns tasks sorted by `date` in ascending order by default.

parameters.name: isDone
parameters.description: Optional filter by completion status.   When omitted, returns both completed and uncompleted tasks.

200.description: List of tasks sorted by date

post.description: Private endpoint to create a new task.

patch.summary: Toggle the status of a task
patch.description: Toggles the `isDone` field of a task.

parameters.name: taskId
parameters.description: The ID of the task to update

get.description: Retrieve information about the 20th week (public access, no authentication required).

message.example: The week has been successfully loaded.

babyActivity.example: Ви вже чітко відчуваєте рухи дитини...

momDailyTips.example: Екватор! Половина шляху пройдена. Відзначте цю дату!

get.description: Retrieve information about the mom's body based on the week number or fetch all weeks data.

parameters.name: weekNumber
parameters.description: The week number to retrieve data for. If not provided, all weeks data will be returned.
